urls.title: 15 times Trump praised China as coronavirus was spreading across the globe
urls.description: The president has lambasted the WHO for accepting Beijing’s assurances about the outbreak, but he repeated them, as well.

domain.name: Person

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @DonaldJTrumpJr The legitimate press is covering all the news related to China including showing all the video footage and recordings of your dad praising China and China's president for their handling of the Coronavirus. https://t.co/eDBFN26UaK
